This is a testharness.js-based test.
[FAIL] Permissions-Policy header "battery=()" disallows the top-level document.
  assert_unreached: Should have rejected: undefined Reached unreachable code
[FAIL] Permissions-Policy header "battery=()" disallows same-origin iframes.
  assert_false: navigator.getBattery() expected false got true
[FAIL] Permissions-Policy header "battery=()" disallows cross-origin iframes.
  assert_false: navigator.getBattery() expected false got true
Harness: the test ran to completion.
